Title: IconizedButton Control Set
Description: ASP.NET WebForms IconizedButton Custom Control Set.  Replaces the dull Button/LinkButton/HyperLink controls with styling and left and right aligned icons (via FamFamFam icon set).  Contains built-in control styles/skins.  Available customized user-configured styles/skins via CSS.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
ASP.NET WebForms IconizedButton Custom Control Set. Replaces the dull Button/LinkButton/HyperLink controls with styling and left and right aligned icons (via FamFamFam icon set). Contains built-in control styles/skins. Available customized user-configured styles/skins via CSS.


IconizedButton Control Set Documentation:
I wanted to put all the documentation here or on the Documentation tab; however, I'm not a fan of the Wiki markup. If you're interested, take a look at my blog entry covering the documentation here: IconizedButton Control Set Documentation.
